list_items: This adapter was designed to meet the requirements defined in {product_name} PRD Rev {prd_revision}.
This adapter was designed to support {port_interface_speed} in the {interfaces} form factor.
This adapter was designed to comply with the {form_factor_specification}.
This adapter was designed to comply with {port_interface_spec} channel loss requirements.
This adapter was designed to comply with the {silicon_datasheet}.
